description: Smallest prime p such that first n primes (p_1=2, ..., p_n) are 7th power residues mod p.
comments: No more terms through 10^11. - Don Reble (djr(AT)nk.ca), Oct 12 2001
references: N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
A. E. Western and J. C. P. Miller, Tables of Indices and Primitive Roots. Royal Society Mathematical Tables, Vol. 9, Cambridge Univ. Press, 1968, p. XXIII.
links: A. E. Western and J. C. P. Miller, Tables of Indices and Primitive Roots, Royal Society Mathematical Tables, Vol. 9, Cambridge Univ. Press, 1968 [Annotated scans of selected pages]
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
extensions: More terms from Don Reble (djr(AT)nk.ca), Oct 12 2001
